column2: Taking sugary drinks helps to maintain my immunity level
Antibiotics do not treat cold and flu
Antibiotic-resistant infections could make medical procedures like surgery and organ transplants less dangerous
When having a cold/flu,one need not rest at home.
Frequent handwashing helps to prevent spread of diseases
Getting at least 7 hours of rest helps to keep us healthy.
Healthy people do not need to get vaccination
Flu vaccination can protect me from all diseases
Bacteria can be resistant to antibiotics
